name: Scriptorium: Volume II - User Manual & Runtime Workflows
description: This manifest anchors the complete set of documents for Volume II of the Codex Universalis. It covers all operational procedures, interaction patterns, and troubleshooting steps for NeuralBlitz UEF/SIMI v11.1.

contents.name: 00_Quick_Start_Synopsis.md
contents.description: The standard operational sequence to bring a NeuralBlitz instance online.

contents.name: 01_Runtime_Environment_Requirements.md
contents.description: Specifications for the host environment, including model substrate and tool entitlements.

contents.name: 02_NBCL_Grammar_Reference.md
contents.description: A quick-reference guide to primary NBCL verbs, their synopses, and essential flags.

contents.name: 03_Command_Workflows.md
contents.description: Practical application examples demonstrating common NBCL usage patterns.

contents.name: 04_Error_Codes_and_Recovery.md
contents.description: A critical reference for identifying and resolving NeuralBlitz operational faults.

contents.name: 05_Advanced_Operational_Modes.md
contents.description: Details on powerful runtime configurations for specialized workflows like batch-export and headless API.

contents.name: 06_Security_and_Governance_Hooks.md
contents.description: Details on the transparent layers that ensure continuous CharterLayer compliance.

contents.name: 07_Export_and_Version_Control.md
contents.description: Standardized procedures for archiving and managing NeuralBlitz outputs.
